channel.title: Question
channel.description:
ok i have a question its kind of stupid and im sure that its been answered somewhere and im gonna search for it as soon as i get done posting this but...
i noticed that when you go to log on runescape in the username spot if you type @blu or @yel or even @red it makes a flashing color does anyone know what this might be for? it striked my curiosity when i was typing in a username and i messed up typing it in

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

hmm… i used to play rsc but i never knew… well thx for the input that helps lol

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @crashe crashe
item.description:
@crashe wrote:

If you finish typing that in… aka @red@ or @blu@… then it stops flashing and makes your text that color.

This is perhaps left in there for novelty, since that was how you changed your text color back in RSC… ah, the good ol’ days.

But really, it doesn’t do anything…

Read full topic
